about_the_game:
Dragon Spirits 2 is a creature-collecting RPG set in a modern urban environment. Players can explore a city filled with urban legends, venture into various otherworldly spaces, and form contracts with different dragon spirits. You can nurture these spirits, customize their abilities, strategize team compositions, and build a formidable dragon spirit squad.

The difference between the prologue version and the full version: The prologue version unlocks 11 low-level maps. (That’s still plenty of content for a free game!)

Story Overview: Cognitive pollution in Metapolis

The protagonist is a game developer living in bustling Metapolis. Her ordinary life is disrupted when dragons from the game she developed appear in reality! Upon forming contracts with these dragon spirits, the protagonist realizes that the real world is being invaded by more dragons of unknown origin. The once vibrant city is no longer just a sleepless town of bright lights; people's minds are being increasingly contaminated, and the line between fiction and reality has blurred!
The protagonist, also known as a pactsealer, embarks on a journey with dragons to uncover the mystery behind these events, restore the city to its former state, and form bonds with more dragon spirits.

80+ Dragon Companions

Assemble your dragon spirit team and command them in battle. But, before recruiting them as your new companions, you must fulfill their unique needs.

Create Your Unique Combat Style

Each dragon spirit has its strengths and team roles, requiring careful consideration when training and in battle. Analyze each dragon's abilities, tailor a unique combat strategy, and adjust their stats through skill setups and equipping items.

Explore the Boundary Between Virtual and Reality

Metapolis is a vibrant place, but the virtual world contamination has made it even more chaotic. Special zones known as Cocoon, scattered throughout the city, are responsible for breaking the boundary between virtual and reality.
In the game, players will explore various Cocoons, each a chaotic vortex of unstructured information and lurking dangers. Of course, there are also wild dragon spirits and other enemies waiting.

Uncover the Dark Secrets of Metapolis

Apart from the Cocoons, there are plenty of regular areas in Metapolis. Navigate different parts of the city to uncover the mastermind behind this crisis. Along the way, you can also take a moment to enjoy the city's scenery and immerse yourself in Metapolis's everyday life.

Battles Between Pactsealers

Meet other pactsealers and their dragon spirits in side missions along the city. Enjoy battles against them, decipher their strategies, and deepen your bond with your dragon spirits, growing together into an unbeatable team.
